CustomField.formula:
(IF(ISBLANK( Decision_Step_1__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Actual_Decision_1__c ), 0,1) + IF(ISBLANK( When_1__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Who_is_involved_1__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Criteria_for_deciding_1__c ), 0, 1) +
IF(ISBLANK( Decision_Step_2__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Actual_Decision_2__c ), 0,1) + IF(ISBLANK( When_2__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Who_is_involved_2__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Criteria_for_deciding_2__c ), 0, 1) +
IF(ISBLANK( Decision_Step_3__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Actual_Decision_3__c ), 0,1) + IF(ISBLANK( When_3__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Who_is_involved_3__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Criteria_for_deciding_3__c ), 0, 1))
CustomField.label: Decisions Completed
